document_name: Energy Code - Measures specific to vehicles: Sub-section 2: Amounts and methods of aid payments
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/FRA/2015/FRA-2015-01-01-Energy Code - Measures specific to vehicles: Sub-section 2: Amounts and methods of aid payments_14b1dd8a04ea773487b8eb142f900eb2.pdf
document_description:
Following the 'Grenelle of the environment' process, a combined bonus and penalty system was announced to encourage the purchase of low-polluting vehicles.

The bonus system applies to new vehicles purchased from 5 December 2007 and is provided as a function of the CO2 emitted.
